sect1.title: RemoveOwnedSubFiles

row.entry: A null-terminated string containing the logical name of the superfile.

A boolean flag specifying to delete the sub-files from disk when TRUE or just remove them from the superfile list of files. If omitted, the default is to just remove them from the superfile list of files.

sect1.para: The RemoveOwnedSubFiles function removes all owned sub-files from the specified superfile. These are only removed if they are soley owned by the superfile. If a subfile is co-owned, (i.e.,a member of any other superfile), then the removal is ignored.
This function may be included in a superfile transaction, unless the delete Flag is TRUE.
